WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 13 JUL
   BY M/V BGP PIONNER IN AREA BOUND BY
   31-27.87S 048-55.23W, 27-03.44S 048-55.23W,
   27-03.44S 044-04.83W, 31-27.87S 044-04.83W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 14 JUL 21.
